name: EUROPEAN FEDERATION OF JEWELLERY
goal:
To represent the Jewellery, Silverware, Watchmaking, Gemstone, Industry and Trade sectorat EU level.

To defend its members'interests and to promote the sector among policy makers and stakeholders representatives.
interests: Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: all the EU initiatives concerning the jewellery manufacturing and retailing sector
